about_the_game:
Expand your marble worlds with the winter pack! Introducing new props, effects, skins, paints and featuring a winter wonderland world to build your coolest track in.

Key Features

A cold winter wonderland, complete with an ice castle, falling snow and an Aurora Borealis, also known as the polar lights! Use the slippery castle walls, the frozen moat and icicles to build new tracks.

Place your own wintery effects, ranging from light to heavy snowfall, hail, dry ice effects and snow storm-like effects! Most of these can even be applied to marbles, creating the complete package.

Explore a range of various ice, snow and frozen ground paints to create your own winterland in any way you want. Some of these are even customizable in color, letting you create ice caverns in green hue, red hue or any color you'd like! These paints once again also return in the form of customizable and standard marble skins.

To top it off, this pack includes 30+ decoration props, create your own marble skiing track using skiing props, use the arctic animal statues with the new transparent ice paint to create beautiful sculptures, and create anything else winter related using icicle props, snow covered trees, woolly hats, gingerbread men and your own polar lights!

This pack contains:
  • 1 Environment
  • 10 placeable effects
  • 3 marble effects
  • 4 customizable marble skin templates
  • 7 standard marble skins
  • 9 standard paints
  • 5 customizable paints
  • 39 decorations

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 2GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 980 4GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
